modName: Classic Classes and Birthsigns-Perkus Maximus Patch
summary: This is a small patch that makes Classic Classes and Birthsigns give out Perkus Maximus' spells instead of the vanilla ones.
descriptionHtml:
Baby's first mod!Â This is a small patch that makes Classic Classes and Birthsigns give out Perkus Maximus' new spells instead of the vanilla ones.

Bound Sword has been changed to Bound Arming Sword.
Turn Lesser Undead has been changed to Aura: Chastise.
Healing has been changed to Recovery.
Raise Zombie has been changed to Reanimation.


Just plug in and install, load order should be right after ClassicClasses.esp.

There shouldn't be any problem beyond that, as only the spells given were changed.

My thanks to Kearsage and T3nd0 for their great mods.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16736/?]Classic Classes and Birthsigns[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59849/?]Perkus Maximus[/url]
author: GuyrAdamantine
